name: Plush Attack
description:
Pitch : 

Play as a child with an overflowing imagination. 

Fight and push back the monsters of your imagination with the help of your favorite toys  and a little bit of sugar. Be the hero you dream to be!

How to play : 

In this shooter where the monsters are predominant, you will have to use your skills and the items found in the park to survive as long as possible.

The Team :

Game Artists

Clément PAHMER / Fantin DAHMANI

Game Programmers

Hugo PETIT--VILLARD / Romain MOUSTY

Game Designers

Adrien HENRIOT / Amine HASSANI / Aloïs DEUGNIER

Sound Designer

Amine HASSANI

Context : 

This game was developed in 4 weeks for a graduation project at the IIM Digital School in Paris. We had a lot of fun working on this project, so we hope you'll enjoy it !
